block.p: ''Clinical trial investigators must be culled from only the finest physicians in the country, since they work on the frontiers of new knowledge. That drug makers are scraping the bottom of the medical barrel is an outrage.''
DR. DAVID ROTHMAN, on a finding that more than 100 doctors sanctioned by Minnesota's medical board were later paid to do research on a drug or speak to other doctors about its uses. [30]
